metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40524 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In Pure-FTPd before 1.0.50, an incorrect max_filesize quota mechanism inthe server allows attackers to upload files of unbounded size, which maylead to denial of service or a server hang. This occurs because a certaingreater-than-zero test does not anticipate an initial -1 value. (Versions1.0.23 through 1.0.49 are affected.)

criterions.comment: pure-ftpd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
